title: Apple pulls error-prone AI-generated news feature in beta iPhone software - Business Standard
summary:
Apple Suspends AI News Feature Due to Inaccuracies

Date: Jan 18 2025 | Source: Business Standard

Apple is suspending an error-prone feature that used artificial intelligence to deliver bogus news alerts to iPhone owners following complaints from several media organizations.

  • AI-generated news alerts were causing misinformation and erroneous headlines.
  • The feature is disabled while Apple works on fixing the underlying issues described as hallucinations.
  • This suspension impacts upcoming software versions, including iOS 18.3 for iPhones and updates for iPads and Macs.
  • High-profile mistakes have attracted attention, such as false alerts from BBC News.
  • Apple's AI initiative began with the iPhone 16, aiming to incorporate more AI in their products.
The BBC was among the media organisations that complained about the balky news summary feature after Apple sent alerts that transformed its reports into false headlines.

The temporary suspension highlights challenges Apple faces in its push into artificial intelligence and the importance of accuracy in new technology.
newTitle: Apple Suspends AI News Feature Due to Inaccuracies

title: Anand Group eyes growth as EV transition drives auto component demand | Mint - Mint
summary:
Anand Group Eyes Growth as EV Transition Drives Auto Component Demand

Publication Date: Not specified   Source: Mint

The Indian auto components maker Anand Group is gearing up for significant growth this year due to the automotive industry's accelerated shift towards electrification, despite facing some global market challenges.

  • Anand Group is focusing on electric vehicle (EV) components, highlighting increased value in thermal systems and braking solutions.
  • Group CEO Mahendra Goyal noted a six-to-seven-fold rise in per-vehicle content value for EVs compared to traditional vehicles.
  • The company has introduced new products like e-compressors and integrated thermal systems tailored for EVs.
“The value proposition for EVs is dramatically higher compared to internal combustion engines.” - Mahendra Goyal

The Anand Group demonstrates its readiness to capitalize on the growing EV market, aiming to adapt swiftly to the developments within the automotive sector.
newTitle: Anand Group Eyes Growth Driven by EV Transition

title: How to stay in the loop with Samsung's new Galaxy S25 series launch event - Pocket-lint
summary:
How to watch the Samsung Galaxy S25 Unpacked event from the comfort of your own living room

Publication Date: January 22, 2025

Source: Pocket-lint

Samsung's major Galaxy S25 series keynote is just around the corner, where the company will unveil the latest generation of its flagship smartphone line and new accessories. Here's how to watch the event unfold in real time.

  • Samsung's Galaxy S25 Unpacked event will be streamed online on January 22, at 1:00PM EST / 10:00AM PST.
  • You can access the live stream on the official Samsung website and its YouTube channel.
  • Expect an overview of the new Galaxy S25 series, which is rumored to include Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite and camera upgrades.
"The majority of the year-over-year upgrades can be described as spec bumps."

Stay tuned for this important launch event as Samsung aims to maintain its dominance in the smartphone market amidst stiff competition.
newTitle: How to tune into Samsung's big Galaxy S25 keynote

title: Genshin Impact Game Developer Will be Banned from Selling Lootboxes to Teens Under 16 without Parental Consent, Pay a $20 Million Fine to Settle FTC Charges - Federal Trade Commission News
summary:
Genshin Impact Developer Faces $20 Million Fine for Misleading Marketing to Minors

Publication Date: October 2023   Source: FTC Announcement

The developer of Genshin Impact has agreed to pay a $20 million settlement after allegations of violating children's privacy laws and misleading marketing towards minors.

  • The agreement includes banning sales of loot boxes to children under 16 without parental consent.
  • FTC stated that Genshin Impact's tactics misled children about the costs and chances of winning in-game prizes.
  • The company collected personal information from children without necessary parental consent.
  • Proposed changes require clear disclosure of loot box odds and the removal of personal information collected from children under 13.
“Genshin Impact deceived children, teens, and other players into spending hundreds of dollars on prizes they stood little chance of winning.” - Samuel Levine, FTC

This enforcement action serves as a warning to companies about the accountability for marketing practices to children.
newTitle: Genshin Impact Developer Faces $20 Million Fine for Misleading Marketing to Minors

title: Review: The OnePlus 13R is a Pixel 9 for everyone else - 9to5Google
summary:
Review: The OnePlus 13R is a Pixel 9 for everyone else

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: 9to5Google

The OnePlus 13R takes a strong stance in the budget smartphone market, deriving its appeal from a combination of flagship features at a more accessible price point, making it an attractive alternative to the Pixel 9.

  • The OnePlus 13R is priced at $599, offering substantial value compared to competitors.
  • It features a robust build and pleasing design, particularly in its “Astral Trail” color.
  • The 6.78-inch OLED display provides vibrant colors and impressive brightness, though it lacks an ultrasonic fingerprint sensor.
  • OxygenOS 15 delivers a smooth user experience based on Android 15, with a commitment to four major OS updates.
  • Equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and 12GB of RAM, performance is strong, making it suitable for gaming and multitasking.
  • Battery life is exceptional, with fast charging capabilities even though it lacks wireless charging.
  • The camera system includes a primary Sony LYT-700 sensor and additional ultrawide and telephoto lenses, producing high-quality images.
  • Overall, the OnePlus 13R offers many premium features at a competitive price.
“If the Pixel is for ‘everyone,’ the OnePlus 13R is for ‘everyone else.’”

In conclusion, the OnePlus 13R provides excellent value for those prioritizing battery life and performance, making it a compelling choice in the budget smartphone segment.
newTitle: Review: The OnePlus 13R is a Pixel 9 for everyone else

title: Instagram will show your friends what Reels you’ve liked - The Verge
summary:
Instagram Introduces Friends' Activity Tab for Reels

Date: October 2023 | Source: The Verge

Instagram is revamping its Reels feature by introducing a new tab that will allow users to see which of their friends have liked or commented on videos. This change aims to enhance social interaction and engagement amongst users.

  • A tab will display videos liked by friends, reminiscent of an older Instagram feature.
  • Instagram's Adam Mosseri emphasized that the platform should be a place for both entertainment and connection.
  • The update may discourage public engagement, as users might hesitate to like or comment on videos.
  • There are concerns regarding privacy and user preferences in sharing liked content.
  • Competition with TikTok is a major factor in this update, aiming to attract users as TikTok faces potential restrictions in the US.
“We want Instagram to not only be a place where you consume entertaining content, but one where you connect over that content with friends.” - Adam Mosseri

This new feature has the potential to reshape how users interact with content on Instagram, balancing between social engagement and personal preference.
newTitle: Instagram Introduces Friends' Activity Tab for Reels

title: This AMD Radeon RX 9070 XT specs leak appears to reveal gaming GPU’s key details - PCGamesN
summary:
AMD Radeon RX 9070 XT Specs Leak Reveals Key Details About New Gaming GPU

Publication Date: January 2024
Source: PCGamesN

The leak of the AMD Radeon RX 9070 XT specs has revealed details about the upcoming mid-range graphics card, including its performance potential compared to prior models. With a competitive release awaited that may rival Nvidia's upcoming RTX 5070, AMD's new GPUs seem promising.

  • AMD Radeon RX 9070 XT and RX 9070 specs leaked.
  • The Radeon RX 9070 XT is said to feature:
    • 4,096 stream processors
    • Base clock of 2,400 MHz
    • Boost clock of 2,970 MHz
    • 16GB of 20Gbps GDDR6 VRAM
    • 256-bit memory interface
    • PCIe 5.0 connectivity
  • The RX 9070 is anticipated to have lower specifications, including 3,584 stream processors.

“If AMD can genuinely improve the ray tracing performance... then AMD may just be in with a chance.”

The leak indicates that if pricing is competitive, and with enhancements in AI and ray tracing performance, AMD could capture a sizeable portion of the market.
newTitle: AMD Radeon RX 9070 XT Specs Leak Reveals Key Details About New Gaming GPU

title: Jewellery brand Indriya plans 100 stores, open to lab grown diamonds pivot - Business Standard
summary:
Jewellery brand Indriya plans 100 stores, open to lab grown diamonds pivot

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Business Standard

Indriya, a jewellery brand from Aditya Birla Group, aims to open 100 new stores in the next 18 months to enhance its presence in the organised jewellery market. CEO Sandeep Kohli stated the company is ready to pivot towards lab grown diamonds if consumer interest grows.

  • Indriya currently has 12 stores across major cities in India and plans to reach 14 by the end of the month.
  • The organised jewellery retail market is valued at Rs 6-7 trillion in India.
  • The brand launched with an investment of Rs 5,000 crore last July.
  • Indriya aims to utilize a franchise model for its expansion.
  • The company reports better-than-expected performance in footfall and sales across its stores.
“Being new, we are quite agile and don’t have any baggage of the past. So, it’s very easy for us to pivot into whichever segments the consumer likes,” - Sandeep Kohli, CEO

Indriya is striving to become a top player in the jewellery segment, competing with established names like Tanishq and Reliance Jewels.
newTitle: Indriya Plans Major Expansion with 100 New Stores and Embraces Lab Grown Diamonds

title: Indriya open to lab-grown diamond pivot; firm plans to launch 100 stores - Business Standard
summary:
Indriya Plans to Open 100 Stores and Explore Lab-Grown Diamonds

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Business Standard

Indriya, the jewellery brand under the Aditya Birla Group, aims to expand its footprint by opening 100 new stores within the next 18 months while considering the potential for lab-grown diamonds.

  • Indriya currently has 12 stores, with plans to increase to 14 by month-end.
  • CEO Sandeep Kohli highlighted the company's readiness to pivot towards lab-grown diamonds if consumer interest grows.
  • The organised jewellery retail market in India is valued at between Rs 6-7 trillion.
  • Indriya is utilizing a franchise model for its expansion efforts.
  • The brand has seen strong performance metrics, with sales exceeding expectations during the festival season.
“We want to be a large-scale jewellery player and be among the top two or three players in the segment,” said Sandeep Kohli.

Indriya seeks to establish itself in a competitive market dominated by brands like Tanishq and Reliance Jewels.
newTitle: Indriya Plans to Open 100 Stores and Explore Lab-Grown Diamonds

title: Elon Musk Offers $6,000+ Salaries for Walking 8 Hours a Day, but Can You Meet Tesla’s Tough Demands? - The Daily Galaxy --Great Discoveries Channel
summary:
Elon Musk Offers $6,000+ Salaries for Walking 8 Hours a Day, but Can You Meet Tesla’s Tough Demands?

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Tesla News

Tesla is offering a unique job opportunity tied to its Optimus humanoid robot project, with salaries exceeding $6,000 per month for physically demanding tasks aimed at training the robot’s capabilities.

  • The role is centered around creating the physical intelligence of the Optimus robot.
  • Candidates will need to use VR headsets and motion sensor suits to perform various physical actions.
  • The position has specific height, flexibility, and technical adaptability requirements.
  • There are challenges associated with extended virtual reality exposure, including potential virtual reality sickness.
  • Optimus robots are already operational in Tesla's Fremont factory, showcasing their functionality.
  • Musk believes that humanoid robots will reshape labor markets.
  • The project hints at a future where robotics and humans work collaboratively in various sectors.
"This role is not just lucrative—it’s transformative. Participants are contributing to technology that could redefine industries."

The Optimus project signals a pivotal shift for Tesla towards an automated society, raising questions about employment and the future of human-robot interaction.
newTitle: Elon Musk's $6,000 Salary Offering for Challenging Job with Optimus Robot

As artificial intelligence continues to evolve, compliance software companies are attempting to interpret the complex language of traders in order to combat financial crimes.

title: Microsoft shows how Gen AI can aid material discovery with MatterGen AI model - The Indian Express
summary:
Microsoft shows how Gen AI can aid material discovery with MatterGen AI model

Date: January 17, 2025

Source: Indian Express

Microsoft Research has unveiled MatterGen, an AI model that revolutionizes the discovery of new materials, significantly improving the speed and efficiency of material creation.

  • MatterGen utilizes a diffusion architecture to generate new materials across the periodic table.
  • It produces stable materials twice as effectively as previous methods.
  • The model can tailor materials based on specific properties like strength or weight.
  • Breakthroughs include generating magnets without rare Earth elements.
  • This technology promises advancements in various sectors, including technology and energy.
“If AI models like MatterGen can design materials faster, they can improve technology substantially.”

This innovation marks a significant step forward in material science, holding the potential to address issues such as resource scarcity and environmental pollution.
newTitle: Microsoft Introduces MatterGen AI for Accelerating Material Discovery
